Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class MatchRegistry

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.MatchRegistry
public class MatchRegistry extends Object
This class keeps track of all the matches that are currently active. It is a singleton. It manages all the game-related UserCommands in the following way:
  • if type == "PONG" then let the Match instance manage the command (the ping responses have priority over all other messages)
  • if type == "FETCH" return all the currently active matches
  • if type == "CREATE", create a new Match and then send a new JOIN command to the Match
  • else, let the Match instance manage the command
See Also:
  • Match
  • UserCommand
  • Dispatcher

  • Field Details

    • registryInstance

      private static MatchRegistry registryInstance
      The concrete GameRegistry instance.

    • matches

      private final List<Match> matches
      The list of currently active Matches on this server.

    • matchSupplier

      private final BiFunction<Integer,Game,Match> matchSupplier
      A supplier of Matches that is called every time a new Match has to be created. In production environment, a normal Match instance should be returned, while other implementation of the Match class have been used during tests (see related tests).

    • persistenceManager

      private PersistenceManager persistenceManager
      A PersistenceManager instance responsible for all the saving/loading operations from disk of the server.

  • Constructor Details

    • MatchRegistry

      protected MatchRegistry(BiFunction<Integer,Game,Match> matchSupplier)
      Default constructor.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static MatchRegistry getInstance(BiFunction<Integer,Game,Match> matchSupplier)
      Getter for the GameRegistry instance. It allows to specify a matchSupplier. Note that this is possible only when the GameRegistry is instantiated, otherwise, this method returns the previously instantiated GameRegistry.
      Parameters:
      matchSupplier - the supplier for new Matches
      Returns:
      the GameRegistry instance

    • getInstance

      public static MatchRegistry getInstance()
      Getter for the GameRegistry instance. If the singleton is not yet instantiated, this method instantiates it with the default Match(int, Game) as matchSupplier.
      Returns:
      the GameRegistry instance

    • getPersistenceManager

      public PersistenceManager getPersistenceManager()
      Getter for the persistenceManager
      Returns:
      persistenceManager

    • executeCommand

      public void executeCommand(Dispatcher dispatcher, com.google.gson.JsonObject jsonCommand)
      This method manages a command, expressed as a JSON object (gson's JsonObject), and decides whether to process the response directly (in case of a FETCH, CREATE or HEARTBEAT command) or to route it to a specific Match (in case of another type attribute (see net protocol docs)).
      Parameters:
      dispatcher - the Dispatcher instance that sent the command
      jsonCommand - the command, expressed as a JSON object
      See Also:
      • fetchMatches(Dispatcher)
      • createMatch(Dispatcher, JsonObject)
      • sendCommandToMatch(Dispatcher, JsonObject)

    • dispatchPong

      private void dispatchPong(Dispatcher dispatcher, com.google.gson.JsonObject command)
      Helper method for dispatching a PONG message to the Match instance with the specified id.
      Parameters:
      dispatcher - the player's Dispatcher
      command - the JsonObject representing the PONG command

    • fetchMatches

      private void fetchMatches(Dispatcher dispatcher)
      Helper method for fetching all active Matches and sending back to the Dispatcher the formatted response.
      Parameters:
      dispatcher - the player's Dispatcher

    • createMatch

      private void createMatch(Dispatcher dispatcher, com.google.gson.JsonObject command)
      Helper method that creates a new Match with the specific arguments passed inside the command. It then creates a new JOIN command for the requesting player and executes it.
      Parameters:
      dispatcher - the player's Dispatcher
      command - the JsonObject representing the CREATE command

    • sendCommandToMatch

      private void sendCommandToMatch(Dispatcher dispatcher, com.google.gson.JsonObject command)
      Helper method for routing a command to the corresponding Match instance.
      Parameters:
      dispatcher - the player's Dispatcher
      command - the JsonObject representing the match-specific command

    • chooseGameId

      private int chooseGameId()
      Helper method that picks a game ID (unique identifier) for a new game. This implementation picks the smallest positive (or zero) integer that hasn't already been chosen as a game ID.
      Returns:
      the game ID

    • get

      Match get(long id) throws NoSuchElementException
      Getter for the Match with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the Match
      Returns:
      the corresponding Match instance
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if there is no Match in the registry with the specified ID

    • getAll

      List<Match> getAll()
      Getter for all the Matches of the registry (shallow copy).
      Returns:
      the List<Match> of all matches

    • create

      Match create(int id, int nPlayers, boolean isExpertMode)
      Method for creating a new Match with the specified ID and game rules (number of players and expert mode).
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the Match
      nPlayers - the number of players of the game
      isExpertMode - if the game is an expert mode game
      Returns:
      the newly created Match

    • terminate

      void terminate(long id) throws NoSuchElementException
      Method for killing the Match with the specified ID. Before that, all the match-termination operations are performed.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the Match
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if a Match with the corresponding ID does not exist in the registry

    • terminate

      void terminate(long id, String reason) throws NoSuchElementException
      Method for killing the Match with the specified ID. An END message is sent to all connected dispatchers with the specified reason.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the Match
      reason - a String that specifies why the Match has been terminated
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if a Match with the corresponding ID does not exist in the registry

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
